medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient states that shortly after eating dinner yesterday evening, she started having severe epigastric pain, described as 'the worse pain of her life,' sharp in nature, with radiation to her back. The pain lasted for 7 hours and subsided on its own. Tylenol and anti-acid medications were taken without relief.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1) Hyperlipidemia 2) Vitamin D deficiency 3) Appendectomy in grade school.
medical_history.family_history: Father deceased with a history of hyperlipidemia; mother living with hyperlipidemia and diabetes; history of diabetes on paternal side.
